name: EchoСhrome
description:
WARNING: This game features flashy and fast color changes and may cause seizures to sensible people
Try to get the Shotgun as fast as possible! All you will see in this game is your sound, Try not to get lost in this procedurally generated level.
There are 3 difficulty modes and 3 weapons:
PistolRifleShotgun.
Kill boxes to gain money and buy better weapons!
Controls:
Move: WASD or ZQSD (for french people)Change weapon: ScrollBack to main menu: Escape
